data.name: Sp Capture of Tortuga
data.desc: San Domingo military expedition against Tortuga
data.agents_nsp0: Gov Christopher Wormely of Ship 'William and Anne'
data.note:
According to the Sp acct some 600 men, women, and children had been found present [Jan 1635] in the settlement and in the ships in the harbour /Newton 193 /
 According to the Spaniards' account, there were in Tortuga 600 men bearing arms, besides slaves, women and children /Haring 61 / 70 Eng prisoners taken /Haring 61
